short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Modify YouTube thumbnails to include text from MatPat's videos

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use MatPatify to make your YouTube browsing more enjoyable. Is using the YouTube platform boring? Do you struggle to discover entertaining click-bait videos? avert your fears. Every thumbnail gets a MatPat styled thumbnail thanks to this plugin. Memer approved. 

Miss the consistency of the old set of images? Well, now you can have that and more with MatPatify: Classic. (https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/matpatify/pppcnllfiaodbldgjdboiompbggddhdo)

Compatible with all browsers. 

Notes:
- This extension was inspired by [Unnecessary Inventions](http://www.youtube.com/@UnnecessaryInventions) and his [website](http://www.mrbeastify.com/).
- This extension is unofficial and not affiliated with MatPat or YouTube.
- This extension was made by @surely_somebody and you can find her at (https://twitter.com/surely_somebody) and (https://www.youtube.com/@surelysylvie).
- I have done no work on this extension outside adding to the README, Manifest, and publishing it on extension sites.
- I took some images from an extension I published here (https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/erics-thumbnail-seasoning/oobjdndpcnjgkcglpiolckhaigicdoia?hl=en&authuser=0) And all the credit goes to @Eric_The_Toon and you can find him at (https://twitter.com/Eric_The_Toon) and (https://www.youtube.com/@EricTheToon)
